Marca: {{car.marca}}

Modello: {{car.nome}}

Cilindrata: {{car.cilindrata}}

Prezzo: {{car.prezzo}} $

Anno: {{car.anno}}

Dettagli Auto

Marca: {{selectedCar?.marca}}

Modello: {{selectedCar?.nome}}

Cilindrata: {{selectedCar?.cilindrata}}

Prezzo: {{selectedCar?.prezzo}} $

Anno: {{selectedCar?.anno}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { WebserviceService } from '../service/webservice.service'; @Component({ selector: 'auto', templateUrl: './auto.component.html', styleUrls: ['./auto.component.css'] }) export class AutoComponent implements OnInit{ private url: string = 'http://localhost:8888/'; auto: any = []; data: any; constructor(public webserviceService: WebserviceService) { } async ngOnInit(){ await this.webserviceService.getCarsSql('getCars'); console.log(this.webserviceService.myCars); this.auto = this.webserviceService.myCars; } selectedCar: any = null; isModalVisible: boolean = false; // Function to show modal showCarModal(car: any): void { this.selectedCar = car; this.isModalVisible = true; } // Function to close modal closeCarModal(): void { this.selectedCar = null; this.isModalVisible = false; } }
